original_text: and when you eat of the bread of the land, you shall present a contribution to the Lord.
korean_text: 그 땅의 양식을 먹을 때에 여호와께 거제를 드리되

sentences.original_text: and when you eat of the bread of the land
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 그 땅의 곡식을 먹을 때에는

sentences.original_text: you shall present a contribution to the Lord.
